note: CCFC had a nick name - the Bantams. It was associated with a demand for ‘the old five’. Now known as the Sky Blues, I’ve seen the old five a few times.  Can’t stand lying politicians of whatever hue, but definitely not a Tory. Detest journalists who don’t speak truth to power.  Coventry City season ticket holder. We should adopt the Long and Winding Road as a terrace song - we live it.
